event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to disguise their scents from enemies with kelp and seawater.

As a storm rages across the beach and waves crash upon the shore, m_c is tucked up in the healers' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight/m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

As a storm rages across the beach and waves crash upon the shore, m_c is tucked up in the elders' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight/m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.
The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today: omen_list_sight/m_c... m_c dips a paw in a rockpool, watching the tiny, crawling life inside, and considering what the omens foretell.
m_c sits by the water, contemplating the calm waves that brush {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws and wondering why times are not as peaceful as the tides.
A huge wave crashes into camp, leaving everyone soaked and the herb stores quite damaged.
m_c finds an old seagull nest while out hunting. It seems to be long abandoned, but some pretty feathers have remained intact! m_c decides to take some with {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
